name: Illustration
description:
As the name suggested, I will be drawing a single illustration. It can be anything though. I have even drawn a character sheet before!
 - Max characters: 3
 - Simple background OK! 
 - Complex background: cost subject to consideration.

pricing_examples.description:
- **Base half body flat color price**: 20USD
 - **2 Extra Characters**: 10USD each
 - **Total**: 40USD

- **Base full body flat color price**: 25USD
 - **3 Extra characters**: 10USD each
 - **Simple background**: Free
 - **Total**: 55USD

- **Base half body full color price**: 27USD
 - **1 Extra Character**: 10USD each
 - **Complex background**: 40USD
 - **Total**: 77USD

- **Base full body full color price**: 25USD
- **1 Extra Character**: 10USD each (Goat)
 - **Complext background**: 10USD (Paint over photo)
 - **Total**: 45USD
